story: Mina Malak shared Restart Technology's event to the group: Egyptian Geeks.

Instructor Biography:
Amr Mohsen is a Co-Founder and CTO of RESTART Technology and Founder of HumYum, a platform for online cooking.
He is working as Study Group Leader at Mobile Launchpad program with Google, Udacity and iTi to provide the best training for the program interns, worked with AMIT, Orascom for Training & Technology, AASMTT as Android instructor, Former GSA and GSA Adviser, and a mobile Entrepreneur, worked at Starware as Android developer, He graduated from Computer Science, El-Shorouk academy. through the previous 3 years, he gave 12 sessions about Android, created 24 workshop in Android development, trained more than 200 students.


Course :- [6 weeks] 
Cost :- 1200 L.E after one week
Early Bird 1000 L.E
